document_name: Decree-Law no. 53/2010 (on the legal regime for the development of two solar photovoltaic centers)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/CPV/2010/CPV-2010-11-22-Decree-Law no. 53_2010 (on the legal regime for the development of two solar photovoltaic centers)_fade1ab4d3bde93bd2c5ebd3882b7df5.pdf
document_description: This Decree-Law establishes the legal regime for the development of two solar photovoltaic centers in the country. These projects are located in Cidade da Praia (Santiago Island) and Murdeira (Sal Island). The document attributes concession to the company in charge and defines the given contract.
